name: exile
description: Exiles a user from the Roblox group.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to exile?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: revertranks
description: Reverts all ranking events within the time of the specified duration.

options.name: duration
options.description: How much time of ranking events would you like to revert?

options.name: filter
options.description: Do you want to filter actions to a specific Roblox user?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: activity
description: Provides the amount of minutes a user is in game,

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to view the activity of?

name: help
description: Gets a list of commands to try.

options.name: command-name
options.description: What command would you like to learn more about, if any?

name: info
description: Displays information about a group member, and gives you some quick actions.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to view the information of?

name: signal
description: If configured, this will store a command and make it available through our API.

options.name: signal
options.description: What signal/command would you like to run?

name: acceptjoin
description: Accepts the join request from a user.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Whose join request do you want to accept?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: denyjoin
description: Denies the join request from a user.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Whose join request do you want to deny?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: joinrequests
description: Gets a list of pending join requests.

name: demote
description: Demotes a user in the Roblox group.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to demote?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: fire
description: Sets a users rank in the Roblox group to 1.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to fire?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: promote
description: Promotes a user in the Roblox group.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to promote?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: setrank
description: Changes the rank of a user in the Roblox group.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Whose rank would you like to change?

options.name: roblox-role
options.description: What role would you like to change them to?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: shout
description: Posts a shout on the Roblox group.

options.name: content
options.description: What would you like the content of the shout to be?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to suspend?

options.name: duration
options.description: How long should they be suspended for? (Format example: 1d, 3d12h, 3 days)

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: unsuspend
description: Removes a suspension from a user, and ranks them back to their previous role.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to unsuspend?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to add XP to?

options.name: increment
options.description: How much XP would you like to add?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to remove XP from?

options.name: decrement
options.description: How much XP would you like to remove?

options.name: reason
options.description: If you would like a reason to be supplied in the logs, put it here.

name: xprankup
description: Ranks a user up based on their XP.

options.name: roblox-user
options.description: Who do you want to attempt to rankup? This defaults to yourself.
